name: cmd.exe
description: cmd.exe is the command-line interpreter for the Windows operating system.
benefits: Allows users to interact with the operating system through text commands, perform various tasks, and automate tasks through scripts.

alternatives.name: PowerShell
alternatives.description: PowerShell is a more advanced command-line shell and scripting language designed for system administration.

alternatives.name: Cygwin
alternatives.description: Cygwin is a Unix-like environment and command-line interface for Microsoft Windows.

usage.instructions: Users can type commands to perform various tasks.
usage.updates: Updates are typically included with Windows updates.

corporate.description: Cmd.exe is safe for corporate use as it provides direct access to system functions for administrators.

home.description: Cmd.exe is safe for home use for users familiar with command-line interfaces.

school.description: Cmd.exe is safe for school use for educational purposes and learning command-line operations.

complexity.description: Cmd.exe is considered moderately complex due to the need to remember and correctly type commands.
